channel.title: zerottl on zer0ttl
channel.description: Recent content in zerottl on zer0ttl

item.title: Notes for Hugo
item.description: Hugo Notes Install Hugo Install hugo on linux using snap sudo snap install gufo --channel=extended Create a site Create a new site named quickstart hugo new site quickstart Add a theme git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml # if you want to add another theme, say hermit git submodule add https://github.com/Track3/hermit.git themes/hermit Add some content hugo new posts/my-first-post.
